oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clinch River before land was cleared for Norris Dam
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frykholm, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For current rights information, please visit: http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001200
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows the landscape along the Clinch River near Norris and Loyston, Tennessee before the land was cleared and flooded by Norris Dam. Civilian Conservation Corps Co. 297 in Loyston, Tennessee worked on this project.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civilian Conservation Corps (U.S.)
Tennessee Valley Authority.
Tennessee Valley Authority and "grass roots democracy" .
Transportation and Internal Improvements.
Nature and Environment.
Farming and Agriculture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices, http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001199
